actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to require the sine die adjournment of Congress by October 15 of each year.

summary.text: Amends the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to prohibit compensation of a Member of Congress for service after October 15 of a year and before January 3 of the succeeding year unless such service follows the sine die adjournment of the last regular session of the Congress which began before the start of that period. Makes the provisions of this Act inapplicable with respect to any day on which: (1) a state of war exists pursuant to a declaration of war by the Congress; and (2) the Congress is in session, having been convened by the President under specified provisions of the Constitution.

titles.title: A bill to require the sine die adjournment of Congress by October 15 of each year.
